title: Pad Thai noodles with chicken
ingredients: ['200-250g dried medium rice noodles', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '2-4 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '1 red or green Thai chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '350g skinless chicken breast fillets, cut into thin slices', '2 eggs, beaten', '200g bean sprouts', '1 tbsp soy sauce, or to taste', '2 tbsp fish sauce, or to taste', '1 tbsp lime juice, plus lime halves to serve (optional)', 'crushed chilli flakes, to taste (optional)', '1 bunch of fresh chives, snipped', '30g roasted peanut halves']
